title: PIN Code Verification
description: This function block verifies a PIN code entered by the user. It checks the entered byte against the expected PIN stored as a string and confirms if the correct sequence is entered, outputting a boolean result indicating success.
name: PIN_CODE

input.name: CB
input.description: The byte value representing the current code input by the user.

input.name: E
input.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the input verification should be processed.

input.name: PIN
input.description: The PIN code string that the user needs to match, up to 8 characters long.

output.name: TP
output.description: A boolean output indicating whether the proper PIN code has been detected (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
